Code: EXEC SQL SELECT DISTINCT H.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, H.OCORHIST, H.OPERACAO, H.DTMOVTO, H.VAL_OPERACAO, H.SITCONTB, O.DES_OPERACAO, A.NUM_APOLICE, A.NRPARCEL, A.COD_AGENCIA_DEB, A.OPER_CONTA_DEB, A.NUM_CONTA_DEB, A.DIG_CONTA_DEB, A.COD_RETORNO_CEF, A.DTCREDITO FROM seguros.v0histsini H WHERE H.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND H.OPERACAO IN (1070, 1071, 1072, 1073, 1074, 1030, 1040) AND H.SITCONTB = '3' AND O.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' AND O.COD_OPERACAO = H.OPERACAO AND A.NUM_APOLICE = H.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND A.NRPARCEL = H.OCORHIST ORDER BY H.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, H.OCORHIST, H.OPERACAO DESC END SQL
